TEXT.TITLE: LEGG MASON <LM> SETS UP CORPORATE FINANCE UNIT
TEXT.BODY:
Legg Mason Wood Walker Inc, a unit of Legg Mason Inc, said it formed a Philadelphia-based corporate finance unit headed by Graham Humes, formerly head of corporate finance for Mellon Bank Corp <MEL>.
Reuter
